extendedInfo.description: SALE: Simple Organizer Pro is now 50% off for a limited time!Simple Organizer is a powerful productivity app that simplifies the way you take notes, create and organize your daily tasks and manage all your personal events on your Android device."It syncs with Google, comes with a variety of widgets and is simple to use. âall under one roofâ solution." - androidtapp.com - http://www.androidtapp.com/simple-organizer-pro/"great Google Calendar syncing application that we can use to organize our life" - dailyappshow.com - http://dailyappshow.com/simple-organizer-proSimple Organizer PRO with Google Sync and many more features is available on Play Store.FEATURES* Beautiful and rich user interface on all versions of Android* Create, edit and organize notes, tasks and events* Pin your notes, tasks and events to Androidâs notification area* Search notes, tasks and events with instant results* Set a priority for each task and event* Sort tasks and events by priority, by name, by date and time or by location* Organize your events in 2 ways: List View or Calendar View* Create repeating or all day long events with additional details* Setup personal event reminders via notifications, alarms or email* Gmail notification options for personal event reminders* Option to automatically unlock device on reminder alarm* View event locations on Google Maps* Quickly create notes, tasks and events via the built-in home screen widget*** Simple Organizer Pro with Google Sync is available in Google Play, search "Simple Organizer Pro" to get it ***ADDITIONAL FEATURES in PRO Version* Full Sync with Google Calendar* Ad-Free* Import all content from Simple Organizer* Optimized for faster performance and less memory usage* Add images from your camera or gallery to your notes, tasks and events* View image previews or open full scale images with your favorite gallery* Share notes, tasks or events with your friends* Instantly create notes after selecting text or event directly from Calendar View* Batch delete notes, tasks and events using swipe gestures* Organize your personal events by Type* Personal Agenda for quickly viewing and editing upcoming events* Use swipe gestures while viewing notes, tasks, events or when navigating the Calendar and Agenda* Improved Main Menu layout* Change the default location for saving images* 2 additional widgets: monthly Calendar and Upcoming eventsWebsite: http://cubereflect.co.uk/Twitter: http://twitter.com/cubereflectEmail: office@cubereflect.co.uk

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Everything in one place makes it so easy and simple... it would be even better if there was a way to log in so things could be backed up, or even just an option to export to sd card
reviews.author: Farha M

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: I use it all the time to stay organized. Thank you!
reviews.author: Cristina Lia

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Been using this for a couple of weeks now, have to say, by far, the best organizer app ever.
reviews.author: Robert Bullen

reviews.title: Compact & Complete
reviews.comment: Very simple yet offers the best features of a compact organizer and the design is just amazing! I love how it organizes the tasks with a subtask details checklist! Greatest app ever! Helps me in my work everyday.
reviews.author: Nenita Ferrer

reviews.title: Would be good
reviews.comment: You can not change out of military time i dont see any place to set a alarm
reviews.author: william weimer

reviews.title: Awesome. Just incomplete.
reviews.comment: Could work better if Tasks had Start Date and Time like the feature added on Events, clear progress status e.g. Not Started, In Progress and Completed.
reviews.author: Fundile Soyizwapi

reviews.comment: Easy to use but very simple. Not a high-tech.
reviews.author: Yana Selenzow

reviews.title: Basic.. and that says it all!
reviews.comment: Not too complex, but I like it anyway. Good job developer.
reviews.author: Andreas Osslon

reviews.title: Useful!
reviews.comment: Nice app! Very useful specially to the students. :)
reviews.author: Dean Lambino

reviews.title: Glad I found it
reviews.comment: This handy little app allows me to keep track of grocery lists, calendar appointments and random thoughts that used to get written on little pieces of paper and lost before they were needed. Very helpful and would recommend.
reviews.author: Carrie Shively

reviews.title: Very effective
reviews.comment: The cube allowed hundreds of words within a task checklist which is extremely useful. All it needed was alarm within task. It was effective
reviews.author: Satra Nay

reviews.title: Magnificent
reviews.comment: Very good app and simple to use. I\'ll try the PRO version also.
reviews.author: Michael J. Westbrooks

reviews.comment: Great tool to use. Simple n easy to use.
reviews.author: Richard LOYA JR

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Its easy to use n very useful app. Only if the interface is improved could be 5*.
reviews.author: Manish Gomes
